data.name: Garden Business
data.detailed_description: Garden Business is a relaxing farming simulator. In Garden Business you can establish your own huge farm. Start the game with just one vegetable garden. Grow produce and sell it to buy more land. Buy pesticides and fertilizers so as not to lose your crops, fight pests that will destroy your products. Atmospheric soundtracks will help you relax.
data.about_the_game: Garden Business is a relaxing farming simulator. In Garden Business you can establish your own huge farm. Start the game with just one vegetable garden. Grow produce and sell it to buy more land. Buy pesticides and fertilizers so as not to lose your crops, fight pests that will destroy your products. Atmospheric soundtracks will help you relax.
data.short_description: Create your own farm, collect the grown crops and sell them to buy elite seeds.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Hungarian, Greek, Danish, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Turkish, Finnish, Swedish, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Vietnamese, Czech

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual Core processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Quad core processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4 GB
